mapper.select:
select t1.FAS_DESC_ID, t1.MEA_TIME, t1.CELL, t2.BCCH, t2.TCH, t1.FREQ_NUM, t1.ARFCN_1_150, t1.AVMEDIAN_1_150, t1.AVPERCENTILE_1_150,t1.NOOFMEAS_1_150,t1.CITY_ID,t2.NAME from RNO_GSM_FAS_CELL_DATA t1 left join RNO_CELL t2 on t2.LABEL = t1.CELL where
MEA_TIME >= to_date(${fasMeaBegTime} ,'yyyy-MM-dd') and MEA_TIME <= to_date(${fasMeaEndTime},'yyyy-MM-dd') and t1.CELL like #{cell}
